mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a.id) AS cnt ,b.name AS name FROM moim_todo_write a,people b WHERE a.moim_id=#{no} AND a.STATUS='End' AND a.people_id=b.id GROUP BY a.people_id ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT (SELECT title FROM moim b WHERE b.id=moim_id) AS title ,SUM(progress_done) AS no1 ,SUM(progress_total) AS no2 FROM moim_todo_write WHERE people_id=#{no} GROUP BY moim_id
